Text: The Kaingang (also spelled "caingangue" in Portuguese or "kanhgág" in the Kaingang language) people are a Native American ethnic group spread out over the three southern Brazilian states of Paraná, Santa Catarina and Rio Grande do Sul and the southeastern state of São Paulo.
Triplets:<The Kaingang
3:
--------------------
Text: Kaingang:  Their language and culture is quite distinct from the neighboring Guaraní.
